item.title: Raspberry Pi
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Basic setting Setup guide for raspberry pi Setting for OTG mode for pi zero Guide add the following text to /boot/config.txt # Enable OTG mode dtoverlay=dwc2 Save the config.txt file as plain text and then open up cmdline.txt After rootwait (the last word on the first line) add a space and then modules-load=dwc2,g_ether Create an empty file named as ssh.txt in /boot connect to your pi through ssh
